FuncDef: The display ip routing-table limit command displays limits on the number of routes and prefixes.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays limits on the number of routes and prefixes in all VPN instances.
-

Displays limits on the number of routes and prefixes in a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: Limit-Object Limit-Type     Upper-Limit  Warning    Current    Log-Interval
Limit-Object Limit-Type     Upper-Limit  Warning    Current    Log-Interval
<HUAWEI> display ip routing-table limit vpn-instance vpn1
Limit-Object     Limit-Type      Upper-Limit    Warning    Current    Log-Interval
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The command displays limits on the number of routes and prefixes.
The display ip routing-table limit command displays limits on the number of public routes and prefixes.The display ip routing-table limit all-vpn-instance command displays limits on the number of routes and prefixes of all VPN instances.The display ip routing-table limit vpn-instance command displays limits on the number of routes and prefixes of a specified VPN instance.
